title: [GAMEPLAY] Rek'sai dealing bonus damage to structures
body:
When unburrowed and carrying Ravenous Hydra, Rek'sai's  Queen's Wrath is dealing extra damage to structures on the first hit. She should see this bonus damage on units, but I was under the impression it shouldn't occur to structures.

How to replicate: Start a game with Rek'sai. Put at least one point in Q. Buy Ravenous Hydra. Activate Q. Hit a structure. First hit deals base AD + normal bonus AD as applied by the skill.
